1. Add categories to your different research `.qmd` files. See how those are reflected in the listing page after rendering.

2. *Bonus task!* Change the category list on the listing page to appear as a word cloud. 

   - [See the documentation here](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#categories)

**Advice**:

- Don't try to make all these changes at once! Remember the workflow: edit, save, preview, repeat. 
- Use the documentation at [Quarto.org \> Guide \> Websites \> Document Listings \> Categories](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#categories).
